at.pwd.boardgame.game.mancala

Class MancalaState

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.pwd.boardgame.game.mancala.MancalaState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State

    public class MancalaState
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    State of the current MancalaGame. Mainly containing a mapping between slot/depot ID and number of stones.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MancalaState.PlayerTurnStateProperty
      Class containing whether the current slot/depot is enabled for the current player turn state.
      class  MancalaState.StoneNumProperty
      Class containing the number of stones for a depot/slot.

    • Method Detail

      • stonesIn

        public int stonesIn(java.lang.String id)
        returns how many stones are in the given slot/depot. If the id does not exist a Exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the slot/depot
        Returns:
        The number of stones

      • getStoneProperty

        Stone number property. This should be used by the UI
        Parameters:

        Returns:
